definition: to throw amorous or flirtatious glances at sb (esp. of a woman)
to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon
flatter/charm
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: I winked at Keith who laughed.
sentences.chinese: 我向基斯拋媚眼，他笑了。

sentences.english: Tom ogles on a pretty boy.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆給一個靚仔拋媚眼。

sentences.english: Did you just make eyes at him?
sentences.chinese: 妳剛剛在對他拋媚眼嗎？

sentences.english: He ogled a lady in the pub。
sentences.chinese: 他在酒吧裏向一位女士拋媚眼。

sentences.english: They were looking at me, and leering.
sentences.chinese: 他們全都看着我，給我拋媚眼。

sentences.english: See , he is giving me the eye.
I think that girl winked at me.
sentences.chinese: 我想那個女孩在朝我拋媚眼。

sentences.english: You are makin' googoo eyes on my girl?
sentences.chinese: 喔喔喔哥們你敢對我的女人拋媚眼？

definition: loose woman/slut
dimples (of a woman)
public place with numerous people
lit. cherry mouth (idiom)/fig. a delicate, ruby-lipped mouth
lit. bum beetle/sb who tags along/shadow/sycophant
bring it on!/give me all you got!
lustful/lecherous
to act stupid/to play dumb/to pretend to not know
neck
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
to twist words and force logic (idiom)/sophistry/loud rhetoric making up for fallacious argument/shoving false arguments down people's throats
to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
to leak (of air)/to go flat (of a tire)/to vent one's anger
(coll.) womanizer/skirt-chaser
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
